4. Randy Renshaw

Randy Renshaw
=============

Term: 2 years
-------------

Biography
---------

Randy was born in Kilgore and has been a lifelong resident. Councilmen Renshaw is dedicated to community service and is a member of the Lions Clubs International. He pursued a career in real estate, obtaining over 90+ hours of education in the field.  Randy received his brokers license in 1980 and now has over 45 years of experience.

Education/ Military Service
---------------------------

Randy Renshaw attended Kilgore Schools before going to Kilgore College where he graduated with his Associates in Real Estate.

Community Involvement
---------------------

* Kilgore Chamber of Commerce President, 1996-1997
* Kilgore ISD Board Member, 1982-1992
* Longview Board of Realtors, Board of Directors, 1992-1993
* Realtor of the Year, 1994
* Kilgore Lions Club, Past President, 1987-1988
* Kilgore Lions Club, Treasurer, 1990 to Present
* KIBA, Board of Directors, 1994-1997
* KIBA, Treasurer, 2023 - Present
* Longview Area Association of Realtors, President, 1999
* Kilgore Citizen of the Year, 1997
* Kilgore City Council Member, 2003-2012 (Mayor Pro Tem 2009-2012)

   815 N Kilgore Street  
   Kilgore, TX 75662

   By contacting us, you agree to receive SMS messages from the City of Kilgore. We will not send marketing messages and only contact you regarding the services requested.
